long_description: The Yaylabs! Ice Cream Ball is a fun and easy way to make a homemade treat. Add cream, sugar and ice to 20 minutes of fun, and you have 1 pint of ice cream! Simply load ice and rock salt in 1 end, and ice cream ingredients in the other. Then have a ball with the ball, rolling it around for 20 minutes, and, voila, you've played your way to a pint of delicious ice cream! Fun design will delight kids and adults alike-great for backyard parties, a day at the beach and family camping. Made sturdy for many batches of fun and ice cream; recipes included. The Yaylabs! Ice Cream ball features a copolyester plastic exterior, anodized aluminum can and food-grade rubber O-ring-all 100% BPA free.
